# Transforming Vision Into Reality

PT Harum Energy Tbk menegaskan komitmennya pada keberlanjutan melalui berbagai perubahan strategistis dan pencapaian yang nyata. Di tahun 2023, diversifikasi usaha ke bidang pertambangan dan pengolahan nikel membruahkan telah nyata dan dinilai memuaskan. Demikian pula pada strategi untuk mencogoptimalkan segmen batubara yang merupakan cikal bakal usaha kami, terus membrukukan kinerja keuangan yang kuat. Melalui optimalisasi proses Produksi, penguatan infrastruktur, maupun eksplorasiasarbaru, Perseroan diharapkan mampu meraih pertumbuhan jangka panjang yang berkelanjutan.

PT Harum Energy Tbk remains committed to sustainability through various strategic changes and concrete achievements. In 2023, our diversification into nickel mining and processing yielded real results and was categorized as satisfactory. Similarly, our strategy to optimize the coal mining segment, which serves as our legacy business, continued to record strong financial performance. By optimizing our production processes, strengthening infrastructure, and exploring new markets, our company is poised for sustainable long-term growth.

# Pengalihan/Penjualan Saham Hasil Pembelian Kembali (Buyback)

Perseroan telah melaksanan pembelian kembali saham sebanyak 177.352.800 lembar saham (jumlah lembar saham sebelum pemecahan nilai nominal saham (stock split) Perseroan) sampai dengan Juli 2020. Sehubungan dengan saham tidak pentebian kembali (buyback) tersebut, dalam periode sejak 1 September 2021 sampai dengan 31 Agustus 2022, Perseroan telah berhasil menjual/mengalihkan sebagian saham tidak pentebian kembali (buyback) tersebut sebanyak 136.982.100 lembar saham (jumlah lembar saham sebelum stock split Perseroan) melalu BEI.

Namun, oleh karena Perseroan makukanan stock split dengan rasio 1:5 pada tahun 2022, maka-Sejak awal perdagangan saham dengan nilai nominal Barang, yaitu pada tanggal 2 Juni 2022, jumlah sisa saham telah pembelian kembalan (buyback) oleh Perseroan yang makeshift dimiliki oleh Perseroan (yang mana sebelum stock split adalah sebanyak 40.370.700 lembar saham) menjadi sebanyak 201.853.500 lembar saham (saham treasury).

# Sale/Transfer of Share Resulting from the Buyback

The Company executed share buybacks totaling 177,352,800 shares (the number of shares before the Company's stock split) until July 2020. In relation to the shares resulting from the buyback, in the period from September 1, 2021, to August 31, 2022, the Company succeeded in selling/transferring some of the shares resulting from the buyback, totaling 136,982,100 shares (the number of shares before the Company's stock split) through IDX.

On April 28, 2022, the Company submitted information disclosure regarding the plan to sell/transfer the remaining shares resulting from the buyback by the Company totaling 40,370,700 shares (the number of shares before the Company's stock split) through IDX, with the period of sale/transfer starting from May 12, 2022, to May 11, 2023. Until now, the shares resulting from the buyback by the Company have not been sold/transferred, and therefore, the Company intends to extend the period for executing the sale/transfer of the remaining shares resulting from the buyback by the Company.

Nevertheless, because the Company executed a stock split with a ratio of 1:5 in 2022, starting from the share trading with a new nominal value, on June 2, 2022, the remaining number of shares resulting from the buyback by the Company, which are still owned by the Company (which before the stock split was 40,370,700 shares), became 201,853,500 shares (treasury shares).

Furthermore, the Company plans to sell/transfer treasury shares that are still owned by the Company from August 18, 2023, to June 12, 2024, with a maximum number of treasury shares which will be sold through IDX of 201,853,500 shares (the number of shares has been adjusted after the Company's stock split with ratio 1:5 on June 2, 2022).

HNP telah membril sebanyak 12.621 lembar saham, yang mewakili  $4 \%$  dari modal ditempatkan dan modal disetor dalam THN dari PT Mahkota Emas Nickel dengan nilai transaksi jual beli saham sebesar Rp13.355.399.000,-.

HNP purchased 12,621 shares, representing  $4\%$  of the issued capital and paid-up capital in THN from PT Mahkota Emas Nickel with a share purchase and sale transaction value of Rp13,355,399,000.

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/d2a84803-3f08-4afc-9644-8abab41b0dbb/f69c14ff10bf431cb42f67fdb646172cf38c3425a34d886a6075963e989f1e9d.jpg)

26 September / September 2023

Perseroan melalui Entitas Anak telah seksutukan pembelian sahamsah yang dimiliki oleh Central Halmahera Holding Pte Ltd dalam IMI. Dalam transaksi ini, Entitas Anak yaitu THN telah membeli sebanyak 799.999 lembar saham dan HNP telah membeli sebanyak 1 lembar saham, yang masing-masing mewakili  $50.999\%$  dan  $0.001\%$  secara berturut-turut dari modal ditempatkan dan modal disetor IMI dengan total nilai transaksi jual beli saham sebesar USD70.380.000.

The Company, through its Subsidiaries, purchased shares owned by Central Halmahera Holding Pte Ltd in IMI. In this transaction, the Subsidiary, namely THN, purchased 799,999 shares and HNP purchased 1 share, representing  $50.999\%$  and  $0.001\%$ , respectively, of IMI's issued capital and paid-up capital with the total value of share purchase and sale transaction of USD70,380,000.

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/d2a84803-3f08-4afc-9644-8abab41b0dbb/17f2c983c83652b4341babfcc52aafc3c633f8d194d442bd6ac0cd495b04c0c2.jpg)

# 27 September / September 2023

HNI dan WMI telah menandatangani perjanjian pinjaman dengan jumlah sebanyak-banyaknya USD90.000.000 atas nilai setaranya dalam Rupiah untuk tujuan pembiayaan belanja modal, modal kerja dan pembiayaan umum perusahaan,serta investasi.

HNI and WMI signed a loan agreement at a maximum amount of USD90,000,000 or the equivalent value in Rupiah for the purpose of financing capital expenditure, working capital and general company financing, as well as investment.

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/d2a84803-3f08-4afc-9644-8abab41b0dbb/bb29993887c09c8ba64bcfc5186f3f047975ce12afae20b43bc32ade280812a5.jpg)

# 29 September / September 2023

THN memberikan fasilitas pinjaman kepada PT Blue Sparking Energy dengan rumah lesebayak-banyaknya USD500.000.000呆at nilai setaranya dalam Rupiah untuk tujuan pembiayaan pengembangan/pembangunan proyek high-pressure acid leaching, termasuk pembiayaan kembali utang yang ada saat ini untuk keperluaan umum perusahaan. Transaksi ini diharapkan tidakanyak untuk memperlugas diversifikasi Produk nikel Perseroan dalam rangka menciptakan pertumbuhan usaha yang berkelanjutan, tetapi juga untuk memberikan peluang kepada Perseroan untuk berpartisipasi di pasar bahan baku bateri.

THN provided a loan facility to PT Blue Sparking Energy at a maximum amount of USD500,000,000 or the equivalent value in Rupiah for the purpose of financing the development/construction of a high-pressure acid leaching project, including refinancing existing debt for general company needs. This transaction is expected not only to expand the Company's nickel product diversification in order to create sustainable business growth, but also to provide the Company with opportunities to participate in the battery raw material market.

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/d2a84803-3f08-4afc-9644-8abab41b0dbb/94a1c70a26ec7ce99ec336c9fe2ae368581c4f313ef2f31d7467d904659cbceb.jpg)

# 17 Oktober / October 2023

Berdasarkan perjanjian fasilitas pinjaman antara THN dan PT Blue Sparking Energy tertanggal 29 September 2023, kemudian Perseroan memberikan pendanaan kepada PT Blue Sparking Energy sebesar USD300.000.000 tersebut nilai setaranya dalam Rupiah untuk membiayai investasi PT Blue Sparking Energy yang menjalankan usaha di bidang pengolahan dan pemurnian nikel. Saat ini, PT Blue Sparking Energy sedang mengembangkan projek high-pressure acid leaching yang berlokasi di Weda Bay Industrial Park, Kabupaten Halmahera Tengah, Indonesia. Proyek tersebut dirancang untuk memproduksi nickel-cobalt hydroxide intermediate product (MHP) dengan kapasitas terpasang tahunan sekitar 67.000 ton setara nikel dan sekitar 7.500 ton kobalt, termasuk dengan fasilitas infrastruktur pendukungnya [proyek]. Transaksi ini untuk keperluan pengembangan dan pembangunan projek tersebut yang didanai oleh Perseroan dalam bentuk pinjaman kepada HNP dan selanjutnya, HNP memberikan pendanaan kepada THN. Masing-masing pendanaan tersebut, baik ketika disalurkan dari Perseroan kepada HNP maupun dari HNP kepada THN didasarkan pada suatu perjanjian antara pihak-pihak erkait.

Based on the loan facility agreement between THN and PT Blue Sparking Energy dated September 29, 2023, then the Company provided funding to PT Blue Sparking Energy of USD300,000,000 or its equivalent amount in Rupiah to finance the investment of PT Blue Sparking Energy which runs a business in the field of nickel processing and refining. Currently, PT Blue Sparking Energy is developing a high-pressure acid leaching project located in Weda Bay Industrial Park, Central Halmahera Regency, Indonesia. The project is designed to produce nickel-cobalt hydroxide intermediate product (MHP) with an annual installed capacity of around 67,000 tons of nickel equivalent and around 7,500 tons of cobalt, including supporting infrastructure facilities (project). This transaction is for the purpose of development and construction of the project, funded by the Company in the form of loans to HNP, and subsequently, HNP provides funding to THN. Each of these funds, either distributed from the Company to HNP or from HNP to THN, is based on the agreement between the related parties.

# >>Board of Commissioners' Report

# Pemegang Saham dan Pemangku Kepentingan yang Terhormat,

Dear Esteemed Shareholders and Stakeholders,

Sebagai segenap jajaran Dewan Komisaris PT Harum Energy Tbk, adalah suatu kehormatan dapat membimbing perusahaan melewati tahun 2023 yang penuh tantangan. Tahun iniunjian bagi kekompakan dan ketangguhan insan Perseroan dalam menjalani berbagai ketidakpastian dinamika ekonomi dan industri. Meski dengan halangan-halangan tersebut, Perseroan meraih dan mempertahankan kinerja yang solid dan berkelanjutan melalui implementasi dari strategi yang tepat dan dedikasi yang tinggi dari seluruh tim. Upaya bersama kami telah memberikan kontribusi yang positif bagi pertumbuhan Perseroan yang inklusif.

As the entire Board of Commissioners of PT Harum Energy Tbk, it is our honor to have guided the Company through the challenges of 2023. This year put our teamwork and resilience to the test as we navigated uncertain economic and industrial dynamics. Despite these hurdles, the Company achieved and sustained solid performance by implementing the right strategies and demonstrating unwavering dedication across the entire team. Our collective efforts have contributed positively to the Company's inclusive growth.

# LAWRENCE BARKI

Komisaris Utama

President Commissioner

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/d2a84803-3f08-4afc-9644-8abab41b0dbb/cc96b18d54b72a21fb8059a222c37bdedee1b4456561594f9d35a570882916d0.jpg)

# Pandangan terhadap Kinerja Direksi

Pencapaian kinerja berakar dari pada strategi operasional dan keuangan yang transparan dan terukur, telah dari perencanaan yang kolaboratif. Dewan Komisaris memandang Direksi telah berhasil menjalankan tugasnya secara efektif dalam mengelola perusahan di tengah kondisi ekonomi yang menantang. Meskipunasarbatu bara mengalamipenurunan yang signifikan, Perseroan tetap berhasil mencatat kinerja positif pada sisi volume produksi dan penjalan. Hal ini menujukkan keberhasilan strategis Direksi dalam mengatasi tantangan tersebut. Keputusan-keputusan strategis yang diambil telah membawa dampak positif bagi kinerja Perseroan.

# Views on Board of Directors' Performance

Performance achievement is rooted in transparent and measurable operational and financial strategies, a product of collaborative planning. The Board of Commissioners acknowledges that the Board of Directors has effectively fulfilled its responsibilities in managing the Company amid challenging economic conditions. Despite the substantial decline in the coal market, the Company achieved positive performance in terms of production and sales volume. This outcome underscores the strategic success of the Board of Directors in overcoming these challenges. The strategic decisions made have significantly impacted the Company's performance.

Selain itu, kepiawian Direksi dalam mencidentifikasi peluang bisnisbaru dan makukan diversifikasi usaha juga patut dihargai. Perseroan telah berhasil menyelesaikan sejumlah investasi strategis di sektor nikel, yang telah membukukan pendapatan. Pencapaian ini diharapkan dapat mencatkan posisi perusahaan di sektor sumber daya energia. # Challenges Faced and Strategies Taken by the Company

In 2023, the Company encountered significant challenges in managing economic and industrial commodity risks, particularly in the coal and nickel sectors. Both of these commodities experienced a sharp decline from their peak prices in the previous year, which had reached historic highs. A key contributing factor was the reduced consumption of industrial commodities in China, one of the world's largest commodities users and Indonesia's primary export market. This imbalance in supply and demand posed potential risks, exerting pressure on the Company's revenue and profit margin, since a substantial portion of our income is derived from coal and nickel sales. Additionally, weather conditions and rainfall remain critical factors in maintaining optimal mining operations.

To overcome these challenges, the Company has devised a strategic plan centered on 2 key objectives: enhancing operational efficiency and diversifying its business portfolio. One of the strategic steps taken is to bolster its coal production and sales to mitigate the potential income reduction caused by price fluctuations. This involves optimizing production processes, streamlining logistics, and exploring new markets. On the portfolio diversification, the Company has proactively invested in several new ventures that promised increased revenue and operating profits. Notably, it has consolidated ownership in Subsidiaries engaged in nickel ore processing to better reflect the business performance. These steps are expected to increase the Company's competitiveness amidst the competitive market conditions.

# Performance Achievements in 2023

Amidst dynamic economic conditions, the Company has adeptly navigated significant challenges while consistently upholding its financial performance. Despite the recent decline in commodity prices, the Company has managed to boost production and sales volumes, resulting in positive revenues. This achievement positions the Company uniquely within its industry.

In 2023, the Company achieved remarkable milestones in coal production and sales. Total coal production volume surged by  $28.9\%$  to 7.0 million tons from 5.4 million tons in 2022. Simultaneously, our sales volume also soared by  $41.2\%$  from 5.0 million tons to 7.1 million tons. The increase in our coal sales volume mitigated the impact from the decrease in the Company's average selling prices which could have resulted in more substantial revenue decline. However, the Company's gross margin narrowed to  $41.3\%$  compared with 2022, mostly due to the lower average selling prices throughout the year. Nevertheless, the Company's substantial coal sales growth which exceeded the overall national average still signifies the Company's market share expansion.

Positive operational performance doesn't solely stem from coal market opportunities, it also arises from the Company's strategic diversification into the nickel sector. This well-prepared investment has yielded impressive results. Specifically, nickel sales volume surged by  $17.0\%$ , reaching 180,019 tons of NPI from 153,816 tons of NPI in the previous year. Pada率达到 yang sama, Indonesia memegang peranan penting dalam industrienikel global dengan kepada pemilikian cadangan terbesar di dunia, mencapai  $23\%$  dari total cadangan global. Dengan potensi cadangan yang bersa daruntumbuhanindustri bateri yang semakin pesat, permintaan terhadapnikel diperkirakan akan terus mencapat. Hal ini menjadikan Indonesia tetap sebagai pilih menarik untuk pengembangan investasi pada sektor pertambangan nikel.

Optimisme tersebut memberikan keyakinan pada Direksi Bahwa sektor pertambangan Indonesia, khususnyaibu bar dan nikel. Meskipun希望大家 komoditas mengalami penurunan di tahun 2023, tren konsumsi energia global yang terus mencapat, didorong oleh transisi energia menuju elektrifikasi, diharapkan akan menjaga stabilitas permintaan akan sumber daya energia. Selain itu, pertumbuhan permintaan akan komoditas pendukung speerti nikel, terutama dari industri kendaruan listrik dan baterai, diharapkan dapat menopang kinerja Perseroan dalam jangka panjang dan mendukung keberlanjutan usaha.

# Implementasi Tata Kelola Perusahaan

Dalam menjalankan operasinya, Perseroan senantiasa seksapanjung prinsip tata kelola perusahaan yang baik (GCG) untuk landasan utama untuk mencapai kinerja yang optimal. Perseroan terus说我mpurnakan systemd dan praktik GCGnya secara Berkala dengan mengikuti perkembangan risiko dan tantangan bisnis. Komunikasi yang efektif antara manajemen dan pemangku kepentingan juga menjadi fokus utama, dan interaksi ini telah berjalan lancar dan rutin tanpa Kendala yang berarti.

was complemented by consolidated revenue generated from ferronickel sales totaling USD 100.1 million in the last quarter of 2023 —marking a significant milestone.

Along with the operational performance growth in 2023, revenue from customers increased by  $2.8\%$  to USD914.9 million, a notable achievement despite weaker market condition. However, an increase in cost of revenue and direct expenses of  $49.6\%$  or equivalent to USD180.2 million exerted pressure on the Company's profitability. Consequently, gross profit decreased by  $29.4\%$  settling at USD382.4 million. Similarly, net profit for the year experienced a  $48.5\%$  decrease to USD195.7 million. Nevertheless, with the right investment and reliable strategy, the Company remains optimistic about achieving sound financial growth in the upcoming period.

# Business Outlook

The Indonesian government has set an ambitious coal production target of 710 million tons for 2024. This production will be prioritized to meet domestic interests, with a DMO (Domestic Market Obligation) target of 181.3 million tons. The upward trend in coal demand is driven by the need for electricity and the implementation of new power generation projects. Simultaneously, Indonesia plays a pivotal role in the global nickel industry, boasting the largest nickel reserves worldwide, accounting for  $23\%$  of the total global reserves. Given these substantial reserves and the rapid growth of the battery industry, the demand for nickel is expected to continue rising. Consequently, Indonesia remains an attractive destination for investment in the nickel mining sector.

This optimistic perspective instills confidence in the Board of Directors on Indonesia's mining sector, particularly coal and nickel. Despite the 2023 decline in commodity prices, the ongoing global surge in energy consumption—driven by the energy transition towards electrification—will likely sustain demand for energy resources. Furthermore, the growing appetite for supporting commodities, notably nickel from the electric vehicle and battery industry, is poised to bolster the Company's long-term performance and ensure business sustainability.

# Riwayat Singkat

# >> Brief History

Perseroan didirikan pada tahun 1995 dengan name PT Asia Antrasit yang bergerak dibidang aktivitas perusahaan holding, aktivitas jasa keuangan, pertambangan, perdagangan, industri, dan aktivitas konsultasi manajemen. Kemudian, pada tahun 2007, Perseroan makukan perubahanNamaunjadi PT Harum Energy.

Perseroan terus melakukan pengembangan usaha untuk mempertahankan eksistensi sebagai telah perusahan pertambanganantu bara terkemuka di Indonesia melalui Entitas Anak maupun Entitas Asosiasi. Pada tahun 2023, Perseroan memiliki 8 Entitas Anak Langsung, 4 Entitas Anak Tidak Langsung, dan 4 Entitas Asosiasi.

Keunggulan Perseroan dibandingkan dengan perusahaan pada industri sejenis terletak pada rantai Produksi yang terintegrasi secara vertical untuk menjaga efisiensi operasional agar Perseroan mampu Berkembang dan bertahan kepada siklus bisnis komoditas, baik diasar domestik maupun mancanegara. Hal ini juga didukung dengan tersedianya jaringan jalan angkut batu bara, fasilitas pengolahan batu bara, pelabuhan,{serta armada kapal tunda dan tongkang yang melengkapi layanan yang diberikan Perseroan.

Meningkatnya tren global untuk mengurangi emisi carbon dan penggunaan energia terbarukan telah mendorong Perseroan untuk melakukan transformasi usaha. Sebagai upaya transformasi tersebut, Perseroan melakukan diversifikasi usaha ke sektor pertambangan dan pengolahannikel dengan melihat adanya peluang kebutuhan komoditasnikel sebagai sudah satur material kunci dalam upaya transisi energia global. Investasi-investasi strategis telah dilakukan Perseroan di sektor nikel dalam menjadi tahun belakangan ini. Seluruh upaya yang dilakukan tersebut diharapkan dapat menjaga kestabilan dan kesinambungan usaha Seeingga dapat mencapatkannilai bagi para pemangku kepentingan.

The Company was established in 1995 under the name PT Asia Antrasit, operating in the fields of holding company activities, financial services activities, mining, trading, industry and management consulting activities. Then, in 2007, the Company changed its name to PT Harum Energy.

The Company constantly develops its business to maintain its existence as one of the leading coal mining companies in Indonesia through Subsidiaries and Associated Entities. In 2023, the Company had 8 Direct Subsidiaries, 4 Indirect Subsidiaries, and 4 Associated Entities.

The Company's advantage compared to other companies in similar industries lies in its vertically integrated production chain to maintain operational efficiency. This enables the Company to develop and survive the commodity business cycle, both in domestic and foreign markets. This is also supported by the availability of coal transport road network, coal processing facilities, ports, as well as a fleet of tugboats and barges, which complement the services provided by the Company.

The increasing global trend to reduce carbon emissions and use renewable energy has encouraged the Company to carry out business transformation. As an effort for this transformation, the Company diversifies its business into the nickel mining and processing sector by observing demand opportunity for nickel commodities as one of the key materials in the global energy transition effort. The Company has made strategic investments in the nickel sector in recent years and expects that all efforts made can maintain business stability and continuity, thereby increasing value for stakeholders.

Proyek tersebut dirancang untuk memproduksi nickel-cobalt hydroxide intermediate product (MHP) dengan kapasitas terpasang tahun sekitar 67.000 ton setara nikel dan sekitar 7.500 ton kobalt, termasuk dengan fasilitas infrastruktur pendukungnaya (proyek), termasuk pembiayaan kembali utang yang ada saat ini untuk keperluaan umum perusahan. Transaksi ini didanai oleh Perseroan dalam bentuk pinjaman kepada HNP dan selanjutnya, HNP memberikan pendanaan kepada THN.

# Produk dan Jasa

# » Products and Services

Melalui Entitas Anak dan Entitas Asosiasi, kegiatan usaha Perseroan berfokus pada operasi dan investasi pada industri batu bara dan nikel. Perseroan memproduksi batu bara nonagglomerasi yang memiliki nilai kalori bruto lebihbove dari  $5.700\mathrm{kcal / kg}$  secara GAD abu-bebas dan sekitar  $5.400\mathrm{kcal / kg}$  secara GAR. The Company produces non-agglomerated coal, which has a gross calorific value greater than 5,700 kcal/kg on anash-free GADandaround5,400 kcal/kg GAR. Furthermore, the Company began carrying out business activities in the mining and nickel processing/refining sectors through Subsidiaries and Associated Entities.

# Batu Bara Uap (Batu Bara Termal)

# Steam Coal (Thermal Coal)

Batu bara termal digunakan untuk penggalangan uap dalam pembangkit listrik yang bermanfaat sebagai media dalam proses pemanasan dan manufaktur semen,seperti pemanasan langsung, pemanasan ruang, dan pemanas air.

Thermal coal is used for raising steam in power plants as a medium in the process of heating and manufacturing cement, such as direct heating, space heating, and water heating.

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/d2a84803-3f08-4afc-9644-8abab41b0dbb/bce72ab15dbaea4a8ec6c54c950efa3d9565ad893ade403ccfcb21fe16163e44.jpg)

# Batu Bara Kokas (Batu Bara Metalurgi)

# Coking Coal (Metallurgical Coal)

Batu bara metalurgi digunakan sebagai telah bersan baku atau katalis dalam proses pembuatan心愿希望大家能尽快完成。

Metallurgical coal is used as a raw material or catalyst in the steel manufacturing process.

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/d2a84803-3f08-4afc-9644-8abab41b0dbb/7f8e76dd5f338a6ee719244bd29961e39d2dac177cb6007716b67c029d69b868.jpg)

# Nickel Pig Iron

Nickel Pig Iron (NPI) yang diproduksi dari fasilitas pengolahan/semurnian (smelter) merupakan ferronickel sebagai Produk antara yang digunakan dalamProduksi, diantaranya stainless steel.

Nickel Pig Iron (NPI) produced from processing/refining facility (smelter) is a ferronickel as intermediate product that is used in the production of, among others, stainless steel.

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/d2a84803-3f08-4afc-9644-8abab41b0dbb/82ead9afe448d8f85b0ccd3920ddc87374a343ae3ba9dbf34d7099245f378824.jpg)

# Nickel Matte*

Nickel Matte yang diproduksi dari fasilitas pengolahan/permurnian (smelter) merupakan Produk antara yang digunakan sebagai bahan baku untuk memproduksi nikel sulfat, yang merupakan komponen utama dalam rantai bahan baku bateri.

Nickel Matte produced from processing/refining facility (smelter) is an intermediate product that is used as raw material in the production of nickel sulphate, a key component in battery supply chain.

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/d2a84803-3f08-4afc-9644-8abab41b0dbb/98ae7976b7237d310b7ee977bba15cfd3a9c806c366a540d8b3efd9c83a8faca.jpg)

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/d2a84803-3f08-4afc-9644-8abab41b0dbb/2eb47b3fe5966f8c352a803c27d73ac58419dcc2f7a7949e05b0bd4c5abc398b.jpg)

# Mixed Nickel-Cobalt Hydroxide Precipitate (MHP)**

Mixed Hydroxide Precipitate (MHP) yang diproduksi dari fasilitas pengolahan/permurnian (smelter) berteknologi High Pressure Acid Leaching (HPAL) merupakan produk antara dari pengolahan bijih nikel kadar rendah/limonit, yang merupakan bahan baku untuk memproduksi nikel sulfat, yang merupakan komponen utama dalam rantai bahan baku baterai.

Mixed Hydroxide Precipitate (MHP) produced from a processing/refining facility (smelter) with High Pressure Acid Leaching (HPAL) technology is an intermediate product from the processing of low grade nickel ore/limonite, that is used as raw material in the production of nickel sulphate, a key component in battery supply chain.

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/d2a84803-3f08-4afc-9644-8abab41b0dbb/b06a37121f528130dbdec2addc5be42b9aad34cfb0b2227acc62d8a26a7706c6.jpg)

# General Information

MSJ was established in 1996 and started its coal mining operations in 2004. The average distance between the mining operation and coal processing facility is approximately  $45\mathrm{km}$ . Barge loading in Separi can be accessed via a special haul road managed by MSJ. MSJ's coal mining operations are ISO 9001:2015, ISO 14001:2015, and ISO 45001:2018 certified.

# Sumber Daya Manusia

# Human Resources

Peran dan dukungan SDM yang Unggul, profesional, adaptif, dan berintegritas menjadi faktor yang penting dalam menentukan keberHASIL Perseroan. Oleh karena itu, Perseroan Berkomitmen untuk terus mempertahankan SDM melalui rangkaian proses,rekrutmen yang cermat, program pengembangan SDM yang berkelanjutan, sama penerapan nilai dan budaya perusahaan di seluruh jenjang organisasi.

The Company's important and success factors relate to the roles and support of superior, professional, and adaptive human resources, upholding integrity. Thus, the Company is committed to continuously maintaining HR through a series of careful recruitment processes, sustainable HR development programs, and implementing company values and culture at all levels of the organization.

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/d2a84803-3f08-4afc-9644-8abab41b0dbb/7c87442d0a217b7025494a97a8c1eedc3ce4fb5e8974215243465345c4dc15d9.jpg)

# Rekrutmen

Perseroan memberikan kesempatan setara kepada setiap orang untuk bekerja sebagai kanyakan. Proses rekrutmen kanyakan dilaksanan melalui 2 cara, yaitu:

# Recruitment

The Company provides equal opportunities for everyone to work as employees. The employee recruitment process is carried out in 2 ways, which are:

# Rekrutmen Internal

Internal Recruitment

# Rekrutmen Eksternal

External Recruitment

Dilakukan melalui mutasi kepada promosi karyawan yang sudah ada dengan terpenuhinya spesifikasi jabatan kepada pekerjaan.

By transferring or promoting existing employees, provided that the position or job specification is fully met.

Dilakukan melalui seleksi terbuka bagi masyarakat umum melalui situs pencari kerja dan hubungan kerja sama dengan perguruan tinggi terkemuka di Indonesia.

By selection process open for public through job search sites and cooperation with various leading universities in Indonesia.

Pada tahun 2023, terdapat 8 orang kanyakan yang bergabung di Perseroan dan 36 orang kanyakan bergabung dengan Entitas Anak.

Perseroan juga Berkomitmen menc Gatkan pelibatan karyawan lokal maupun nasional dalam kegiatan operasi dan usaha Perseroan. Pelibatan karyawan lokal maupun nasional sejalan dengan prinsip-prinsip dalam mencapai tujuan pembangunan berkelanjutan. Saat ini, total karyawan lokal (memiliki KTP sesuai wilayah operasional) mencapai  $74.8\%$  dari total seluruh karyawan. Berdasarkan hal tersebut, Perseroan berpotensi memberikan kontribusi positif bagi perkembangan ekonomi dan sosial komunitas lokal.

In 2023, there were 8 employees joining the Company and 36 employees joining Subsidiaries.

The Company is also committed to increasing engagement of local and national employees in the Company's operations and business activities. This is in line with the principles of achieving sustainable development goals. Currently, the total number of local employees (having National IDs according to the operational areal) reaches  $74.8\%$  of the total employees. Based on this, the Company has the potential to make a positive contribution to the economic and social development of local communities.

# Jumlah Karyawan

Jumlah karyawan yang dimiliki Perseroan dan Entitas Anak hingga 31 Desember 2023 tercatat sebanyak 785 orang. Jumlah tersebut mengkat dibandingkan tahun 2022 yang mencapai 734 orang.

# Number of Employees

The number of employees of the Company and Subsidiaries as of December 31, 2023, is 785 people. This number increased compared to that of 2022 of 734 people.

# Kesehatan dan Keselamatan Kerja

Kegiatan operational Perseroan, khususnya di lokasi kegiatan penambangan, memiliki serangkaian potensi risiko kecelakaan kerja yang tinggi. Perseroan sangat memperhatikan aspek K3 karyawan setup dan dengan menyediakan sarana dan prasarana K3serta latihan keamanan.

Penerapan K3 di lingkungan kerja Perseroan diawali dengan identifikasi potensi bahaya-Sejak dini, kemudian dilanjkan dengan pengambilan langkah preventif dan keputusan untuk memitigasi potensi bahaya tersebut. Perseroan juga mendaftarkan seluruh kanyakan pada program jaminan K3 melalui perusahaan asuransi rekanan untuk menjamin dilaksanakannya pengobatan yang memadai secara tepat waktu apabila terjadi kecelakaan. Skema asuransi K3 dievaluasi secara Berkala untuk memastikan Bahwa hal-hal yang tercakup dalam polis asuransi tetap mendukung serta relevant dan dengan kondisi dan risiko yang dihadapi kanyakan saat bekerja.

# Occupational Health and Safety

The Company's operational activities, particularly in the mining site, may potentially pose a series of high-risk occupational accidents. The Company pays great attention to employees OHS aspect at all times by providing OHS facilities and infrastructure as well as safety training programs.

OHS implementation within the Company begins with an early identification of potential hazards followed by taking preventive measures and making decisions to mitigate such potential hazards. The Company has also enrolled all of its employees in an OHS insurance scheme managed by a partner insurance company to ensure that adequate treatment is given in a timely manner in the event of an accident. The OHS insurance scheme is regularly evaluated to ensure that matters included in the insurance policy remain supportive and relevant to the conditions and risks faced by employees while working.

# Tinjauan Ekonomi

# >> Economic Overview

Perekonomian global diproyeksikan tambuh terbatas di tahun 2023++, setelah sebelumnya mencatat pertumbuhan tinggi sebesar  $3,5\%$  -, pada tahun 2022. Faktor-faktor yang memengaruhi pelambatan pertumbuhan ekonomi global di antaranya keterbatasan pasokan karena dampak luka memar (scarring effect) di sisi korporasi dan pembatasan imigrasi di.beberapa negara maju, mencapatya fragmentasi geopolitikekonomi akibat perang Rusia di Ukraina yang menyebabkan keterbatasan pasokan dan hora energi serta pangan global, menurunjya ekspor-impor dan volume perdagangan dunia akibat ketegangan perdagangan antara Amerika Serikat dan Tiongkok, ketegangan di Timur Tengah antara Israel dan Palestine menambah ketegangan geopolitik global, mencapatnya tekanan inflasi karena hora energi dan pangan, serta ketatnyaasar tenaga kerja di(Beberapa negara maju.

Di tengah tantangan gejolak perekonomanian dunia, perekonomanian Indonesia di tahun 2023 tetap berdaya tanan dadumbuh dengan baik yang ditopang oleh permintaan domestik yang kuat. Pertumbuhan ekonomi Indonesia di tahun 2023 tercatat sebesar  $5,1\%$ . Dari sisi lapangan usaha, perekonomanian Indonesia terutama didorong oleh kinerja sektor transportasi dan pergudangan yang tambuh sebesar  $14,0\%$ , diikuti jasa lainnya sebesar  $10,5\%$ , dan penyediaan akomodasi dan makan minum sebesar  $10,0\%$ . Sementara dari sisi pengeluaran, pertumbuhan tertinggi terjadi pada komponen PK-LNPRT sebesar  $9,8\%$ , diikuti komponen PK-RT sebesar  $4,8\%$ , dan komponen PMTB sebesar  $4,4\%$ .

The global economy grew modestly in 2023, reaching  $3.0\%$ , following a previous robust growth of  $3.5\%$  in 2022. Factors that contributed to the slowdown in global economic growth included supply constraints due to the scarring effect on corporations and immigration restrictions in some developed countries. There was also increased geopolitical-economic fragmentation due to the Russia-Ukraine war, which led to supply constraints and global energy and food prices. Declining exports-imports and world trade volumes due to trade tensions between the United States and China, as well as tensions in the Middle East between Israel and Palestine, further contributed to global geopolitical tensions. Additionally, inflationary pressures rose due to energy and food prices, and there was tightness in the labor markets in some developed countries.

Amidst the challenges and turbulence in the global economy, Indonesia's economy remained resilient and grew properly in 2023, supported by strong domestic demand. Indonesia's economic growth in 2023 was recorded at  $5.1\%$ . From the business sector perspective, Indonesia's economy was primarily driven by the performance of transportation and warehousing sector, which grew by  $14.0\%$  followed by other services at  $10.5\%$  and accommodation and food services at  $10.0\%$ . Meanwhile, from the expenditure side, the highest growth occurred in PK-LNPRT (expenditure on consumption by Non-Profit Institutions Serving Households) component at  $9.8\%$ , followed by PK-RT (Household Consumption Expenditure/PK-RT) component at  $4.8\%$ , and PMTB (Gross Fixed Capital Formation) component at  $4.4\%$ .

Dari sisii Harga Batu Bara Acuan (HBA) di Indonesia, pada tahun 2023 dengan batu bara ditutup dengan harga USD117,4/ton, mengalami penurunan dari USD281,5/ton pada akhir tahun 2022. Harga rata-rata HBA tahun 2023 juga mengalami penurunan untuk sebesar USD201,1/ton dari USD276,6/ton di tahun 2022.

The national economy's resilience amidst the weakening global economy has had a positive impact on business development of across various sectors. In 2023, the mining and quarrying industry recorded a growth of  $6.1\%$ . With a proportion of  $10.5\%$  to GDP, the mining and quarrying industry became the fourth-largest contributor and a cornerstone for national economic growth. Additionally, the highest forecasted Non-Tax State Revenue (PNBP) from the Ministry of Energy and Mineral Resources (ESDM) in 2023 came from the mineral and coal components, totaling Rp173.0 trillion or  $118.4\%$  of the target of Rp146.1 trillion.

In line with that, the Ministry of Energy and Mineral Resources (ESDM) recorded that domestic coal production in 2023 reached 775.2 million tons, which was  $112\%$  of the set target of 694.5 million tons. This was a positive coal production achievement, considering that coal production in 2022 was only 687 million tons. The increase in domestic coal production also contributed to the increased utilization of domestic coal, with the realization of domestic coal utilization in 2023 reaching 213 million tons or  $120\%$  of the set target of 177 million tons. Furthermore, coal exports in 2023 were recorded at 518 million tons, an increase compared to 494 million tons in 2022.

In terms of Reference Coal Price (HBA) in Indonesia, in 2023, the coal price was closed at USD117.4/ton, a decrease from USD281.5/ton at the end of 2022. The average price of HBA in 2023 also decreased to USD201.1/ton from USD276.6/ton in 2022.

Harga rata-rata HMA Nikel di tahun 2023 juga mengalami penurunan sebesar  $10,1\%$  menjadi sebesar USD22.823,8/dmt dari USD25.386,9/dmt di tahun 2022.

In contrast to the increased production and utilization of coal, the realization of nickel production and utilization in 2023 experienced a decline. The realization of ferronickel production and utilization was recorded at 535.2 thousand tons, from the 2023 target of 628.9 thousand tons, and nickel matte at 71.4 thousand tons, from the 2023 target of 75 thousand tons. In terms of Reference Mineral Price (Nickel HMA) in Indonesia, in 2023, the nickel price was closed at USD17,653.3/dmt, a decrease compared to USD23,907.7/dmt at the end of 2022. The average price of Nickel HMA in 2023 also decreased by  $10.1\%$  to USD22,823.8/dmt from USD25,386.9/dmt in 2022.

# Pertambangan Batu Bara

Pada tahun 2023, segmen usaha pertambangan batu bara mencatatkan pendapatan atas penjualan batu bara sebesar USD814,7 juta, sedangkan tahun sebelumnya tercatat sebesar USD894,2 juta. Pendidapat dan dari segmen pertambangan tersebut mengalami penurunan sebesar  $8,9\%$  dibandingkan dengan tahun lalu yang disebabkan oleh menurunjya tidak rata-rata batu bara sebesar  $35,2\%$ , meskipun volume penjualan batu bara mencapat sebesar  $41,2\%$ .

# Sewa dan Jasa

Pada tahun 2023, segmen sewa dan jasa mencatatkan pendapatan sebesar USD31,2 juta, mencatingat  $15,2\%$  dibandingkan tahun sebelumnya yang tercatat sebesar USD27,0 juta. Peningkatan ini sieiring dengan bertambahnya volume penggunaan sumber daya yang disewakan.

# Pemurnian Nikel

Pada tanggal 26 September 2023, Perseroan melalui Entitas Anak, THN, menckatkan kepemilikan sahamnya pada IMI dari  $49.0\%$  menjadi  $99.9\%$ . Dengan demikian, IMI menjadi Smelter Rotary Kiln Electric Furnace (RKEF) pertama Perseroan di Entitas Anak dan Perseroan mencatat kinerja IMI dalam Laporan Keuangan Konsolidasian. Sejak tanggal akuisisi tersebut sampai akhir tahun 2023, IMI telah memberikan kontribusi atas penjualan feronikel sebesar USD100,1 juta pada pendapatan Perseroan di tahun 2023.

Pada akhir Desember 2023, konstruksi sipil smelter keda Perseroan di Entitas Asosiasi, yaitu WMI, telah memasuki的前提下 akhir. Pertumbuhan berkelanjutan Produksinikel Perseroan ke depan akan didukung oleh smelter yang telah dimiliki.

# Kinerja Operasi per Segmen Geografis

Pendapatan segmen usaha Perseroan berdasarkan lokasi pelanggan, yakni lokal dan ekspor ditunjukkan sebagai berikut:

# Coal Mining

In 2023, coal mining business segment recorded revenue from coal sales of USD814.7 million, compared to USD894.2 million in the previous year. The revenue from mining segment decreased by  $8.9\%$  compared to last year due to a decrease in the average coal selling price by  $35.2\%$ , even though coal sales volume increased by  $41.2\%$ .

# Rental and Services

In 2023, the rental and services segment recorded revenue of USD31.2 million, an increase of  $15.2\%$  compared to that of the previous year of USD27.0 million. This increase was in line with the increasing volume of use of leased resources.

# Nickel Smelter

On September 26, 2023, the Company through its Subsidiary, THN, increased its share ownership in IMI from  $49.0\%$  to  $99.9\%$ . Thus, IMI became the Company's first Rotary Kiln Electric Furnace (RKEF) Smelter in a Subsidiary and the Company recorded IMI's performance in the Consolidated Financial Statements. Since the date of acquisition until the end of 2023, IMI contributed ferronickel sales of USD100.1 million to the Company's revenue in 2023.

At the end of December 2023, civil construction of the Company's second smelter at Associated Entities, WMI, entered its final stage. The Company's smelter for nickel production will support its future sustainable growth.

Penjalan lokal di tahun 2023 mencatatkan pendapatan sebesar USD144,9 juta menjingkat  $31.7\%$  dibandingkan tahun sebelumnya yang tercatat sebesar USD110,0 juta. Peningkatan penjalan padaasar domestik terjadi karena peningkatan volume penjalan batu bara Perseroan keasar domestik di tahun 2023.

Penjualan ekspor pada tahun 2023 mengalami sedikit penurunan menjadi sebesar USD794,4 juta dari USD780,6 juta pada tahun sebelumnya. Penurunan penjualan ekspor terjadi karena penjualan ke pasar Asia Tenggara dan Eropa mengalami penurunan, namun penjualan ke pasar Asia Selatan mengalami kenaikan di tahun 2023.

Berdasarkan jumlah pendapatan yang diperoleh Perseroan di tahun 2023, segmen pendapatan lokal berkontribusi sebesar  $15.7\%$  dan segmen ekspor memberikan kontribusi sebesar  $84.3\%$ .

Local sales in 2023 recorded a revenue of USD144.9 million, an increase of  $31.7\%$  compared to that of the previous year, which was recorded at USD110.0 million. The increase in domestic market sales occurred due to the increase in the Company's coal sales volume to the domestic market in 2023.

Export sales in 2023 slightly decreased to USD794.4 million from USD780.6 million in the previous year. The decline in export sales occurred due to sales to Southeast Asian and European markets that decreased, however sales to South Asian market increased in 2023.

Based on the total revenues earned by the Company in 2023, the local revenue segment contributed  $15.7\%$  and the export segment contributed  $84.3\%$ .

# Produksi Batu Bara

Selama tahun 2023, MSJ membruiduksi 6,2 juta ton batu bara yang berasal dari kegiatan penambangan di Blok D dan Blok E, dengan memindahkan 71,3 jutabcm lapisan tanah penutup dan rasio pengupasan tanah sebesar 11,5x. Di waktu yang sama, KUP membruiduksi 0,3 juta ton batu bara, dengan memindahkan 0,7 jutabcm lapisan tanah penutup dan rasio pengupasan tanah sebesar 2,7x. Pada tahun 2023, SBB mulai beroperasi kembali dengan membruiduksi batu bara sebesar 0,5 juta ton dengan rasio pengupasan tanah sebesar 12,5x.

# Coal Production

In 2023, MSJ produced 6.2 million tons of coal from mining activities in Block D and Block E, by removing 71.3 million bcm of overburden and a stripping ratio of 11.5x. At the same time, KUP produced 0.3 million tons of coal, by removing 0.7 million bcm of overburden and a stripping ratio of 2.7x. In 2023, SBB started over its operations by producing 0.5 million tons of coal with a stripping ratio of 12.5x.

# Biaya Produktsi Batu Bara

Di tahun 2023, biaya kas produksi batu bara per ton menurun sebesar  $18.2\%$  dari tahun 2022. Penurunan tersebut terjadi karena adanya penurunan biaya royalti, biaya DMO, danarga rata-rata bahan bakar.

# Penjualan Batu Bara

Total volume penjualan batu bara Perseroan di tahun 2023 sebesar 7,1 juta ton atau  $41.2\%$  lebih tinggi dibandingkandari tahun sebelumnya yang tercatat sebesar 5,0 juta ton. Pencapaian penjualan batu bara tersebut didukung oleh faktor cuaca yang kondusif.

Selama tahun 2023, IMI memproduksi 188.596 ton NPI (eq. 28.789 ton Ni).

# Biaya Produktsi Nikel

Di tahun 2023, IMI mencatat penurunan biaya Produksi NPI (/Ni ton) sebesar  $16.9\%$  dari tahun 2022. Penurunan terjadi terutama dikarenakan biaya Produksi dan penurunan hari bahan baku, yakni bijihnikel, dibandingkan dengan tahun 2022.

# Penjualan Nikel

Total volume penjualan nikel IMI di tahun 2023 sebesar 180.019 ton NPI (eq. 27.326 ton Ni), menc Gat  $11,4\%$  dari tahun sebelumnya yang tercatat sebesar 161.528 ton NPI (eq. 25.014 ton Ni). Meningkatnya volume penjualan nikel tersebut karena smelter IMI yang sudah beroperasi penuh sepanjang tahun 2023.

Sejak awal tahun 2023 sampai dengan 26 September 2023, Perseroan mencatat perolehan bagian laba sebelum USD18,5 juta dari IMI sebagai Entitas Asosiasi. Selanjutnya, Perseroan mencatat kinerja IMI sebagai Entitas Anak dalam Laporan Keuangan Konsolidasian. Sejak September 2023 sampai akhir tahun 2023, IMI memberikan kontribusi atas penjalan 7.842 tonnikel senilai USD100,1 juta pada total pendapatan Perseroan di tahun 2023.

# Nickel Production

Throughout 2023, IMI produced 188,596 tons of NPI (eq. 28,789 tons of Ni).

# Nickel Production Cost

In 2023, IMI recorded a decrease in NPI (/Ni tons) production cost of  $16.9\%$  from 2022. The decrease occurred mainly due to production cost and a decrease in the price of raw materials, namely nickel ore, compared to 2022.

# Nickel Sales

IMI's total nickel sales volume in 2023 was 180,019 tons of NPI (eq. 27,326 tons of Ni), an increase of  $11.4\%$  from that of the previous year of 161,528 tons of NPI (eq. 25,014 tons of Ni). The increase in nickel sales volume was due to the IMI smelter which was fully operating throughout 2023.

Since the beginning of 2023 to September 26, 2023, the Company recorded share in profit of USD18.5 million from IMI as an Associated Entities. Furthermore, the Company recorded IMI's performance as a Subsidiary in the Consolidated Financial Statements. From September 2023 to the end of 2023, IMI contributed to the sale of 7,842 tons of nickel worth USD100.1 million to the Company's total revenue in 2023.

# Aspek Pemasaran

# >>Marketing Aspects

# Strategi Pemasaran

Untuk mencatingkatkan pendapatan, Perseroan melakukan diversifikasi Produk.batu bara dengan berbagai spesifikasi, dari kalori sedang tinggi. Hal ini memungkinkan Perseroan untuk menawarkan Produk kepada pelanggan potensial diasar lokal dan ekspor. Pada tahun 2023, batu bara Perseroan selain dipasarkan ke negara di kawasan Asia, juga untuk memenuhi kebutuhan pelanggan domestik,seperti pembangkit listrik, pabrik semen, dan smelter di Indonesia.

Pada tahun 2023, Perseroan memasarkan seluruh Produk feronikelnya keasar Tiongkok.

# Pangsa Pasar

Target utama pagar.batu bara Perseroan adalah perusahaan-perusahaan pembangkit listrik terkemuka di Asia, terutama Tiongkok. Pada tahun 2023, Perseroan juga menargetkan pagar di bereits negara Asia Timur, Asia Selatan, dan Asia Tenggara. Meskipun sebagian tersebut pembeli telah peluangan lama dengan hubungan jangka panjang, Perseroan terus memantau peluang di pagar global untuk mencogtvimalkan pendapatan. Untuk Produk nikel, target utama pagar Perseroan sudah ini adalah perusahaan-perusahaan yang bergerak di bidangproduksti stainless steel di Tiongkok. # Marketing Strategy

To increase revenue, the Company diversifies coal products with various specifications, from medium to high calories. This allows the Company to offer products to potential customers in local and export markets. In 2023, the Company's coal was not only be marketed to countries in Asia, but also to meet the needs of domestic customers, such as power plants, cement factories, and smelters in Indonesia.

In 2023, the Company marketed all of its ferronickel products to Chinese market.

# Market Share

The primary target market for the Company's coal is leading power generation companies in Asia, particularly in China. In 2023, the Company also targeted markets in several East Asian, South Asian, and Southeast Asian countries. Although most buyers are long-term customers with established relationships, the Company continuously monitors opportunities in the global market to optimize revenue. For nickel products, the Company's current main target market is companies engaged in stainless steel production in China. Information on coal market distribution of the Company is shown as follows:

Untuk penjualan nikel dari IMI, target utamaasar Perseroan saat ini adalah perusahaan-perusahaan yang bergerak di bidang produksi stainless steel di Tiongkok. Perseroan terus memantau dinamikaasar untuk mengoptimalkan pendapatan dari segmen nikel di masa mendatang.

# Pendapatan

Pada tahun 2023, Perseroan mencatat pendapatan sebesar USD925,5 juta, mencapat  $2.3\%$  dibandingkan tahun 2022 sebesar USD904,4 juta. Peningkatan tersebut terutama dikarenakan menurunjaya tidakial rata-rata bulu bara Perseroan sebesar  $35.2\%$  menjadi USD114,4/ton dibandingkan tahun 2022, meskipun volume penjualan bulu menjadi mengkat  $41.2\%$  menjadi 7,1 juta tan di 5,0 juta tan pada tahun 2022.

Selain itu, Perseroan juga mencatatkan kontribusi ataspenjalan dari segmennikel sebesar USD100,1 juta sebagai pendapatan Perseroan di tahun 2023.

# Revenues

In 2023, the Company recorded revenues of USD925.5 million, an increase of  $2.3\%$  compared to USD904.4 million in 2022. This increase was mainly due to a decrease in the Company's average coal selling price by  $35.2\%$  to USD114.4/ton compared to 2022, even though coal sales volume increased by  $41.2\%$  to 7.1 million tons from 5.0 million tons in 2022.

Furthermore, the Company also recorded a contribution to sales from the nickel segment of USD100.1 million as the Company's revenue in 2023.

# Beban Pokok Pendidapatan dan Beban Langsung

Pada tahun 2023,beenPokok pendapatan danbeen langsung tercatat sebesar USD543,1 juta,meningkat  $49.6\%$  dibandingkan tahun sebelumnya yang sebesar USD362,9 juta.Peningkatan tersebut dikarenakan adanya kenaikan biaya Produksi seeding menc Gatnya volumeproduksi batu bara terutama di biaya pengerukan serta adanya biaya Produksi feronikel pada tahun 2023.

# Laba Bruto

Di tahun 2023, luba bruto menurun  $29.4\%$  menjadi USD382,4 juta dari USD541,5 juta di tahun 2022. Dengan demikian, margin laba kotor Perseroan juga mencerminkan penurunan menjadi  $41.3\%$  dibandingkan  $59.9\%$  di tahun 2022.

# Beban Penjualan

Beban penjualan Perseroan pada tahun 2023 tercatat sebesar USD43,5 juta, menurun  $33.6\%$  dibandingkan tahun 2022 sebesar USD65,4 juta. Menurunjaya beban penjualan sebagian beschberasal dari estimasi beban kekurangan kewajiban pasar domestik menjadi USD1,5 juta pada tahun 2023 yang menurunjadaudi USD36,5 juta pada tahun 2022. Hal tersebut seiring dengan menc Gatnya pemenuhan volume penjualan.batu bara kepas darastestik. Adapun terjadi peningkatan beban pengangkutan di 2023 menjadi USD36,7 juta dari USD22,4 juta, sesuai dengan menc Gatnya kuantitas penjualan batu bara dibandingkan pada tahun sebelumnya.

# Beban Umum dan Administrasi

Baban umum dan administrasi Perseroan di tahun 2023 tercatat sebesar USD52,1 juta. Jumlah tersebut menc Gat kat  $45,1\%$  dari sebesar USD35,9 juta di tahun 2022. Peningkatan ini sebagian untuk disebabkan oleh mencatnya beban pajak dan perizinan menjadi USD20,8 juta di tahun 2023 dari USD8,0 juta di tahun 2022.

# Cost of Revenues and Direct Costs

In 2023, the cost of revenues and direct costs was recorded at USD543.1 million, an increase of  $49.6\%$  compared to the previous year which amounted to USD362.9 million. This increase was due to an increase in production costs in line with the increase in coal production volume, particularly overburden costs and ferronickel production costs in 2023.

# Gross Profit

In 2023, the gross profit decreased by  $29.4\%$  to USD382.4 million from USD541.5 million in 2022. Thus, the Company's gross profit margin also reflected a decline to  $41.3\%$  compared to  $59.9\%$  in 2022.

# Selling Expenses

The Company's selling expenses in 2023 were recorded at USD43.5 million, a decrease of  $33.6\%$  compared to USD65.4 million in 2022. The decrease in selling expenses mostly came from the estimation of domestic market obligation shortfall to USD1.5 million in 2023, which decreased from USD36.5 million in 2022. This was in line with the increasing coal sales volume to the domestic market. There was an increase in transportation costs in 2023 to USD36.7 million from USD22.4 million, in line with the increase in the quantity of coal sales compared to that of the previous year.

# General and Administrative Expenses

The Company's general and administrative expenses in 2023 were recorded at USD52.1 million. This amount increased by  $45.1\%$  from USD35.9 million in 2022. This increase was mostly due to an increase in taxes and licenses expense to USD20.8 million in 2023 from USD8.0 million in 2022.

# Laba Usaha

Perseroan membrukukan LABa usaha sebesar USD286,9 juta di tahun 2023, menurun dari USD440,2 juta di tahun 2022. Hal tersebut berpengaruh terhadap margin laba usaha menjadi  $31.0\%$  di 2023, menurun dari  $48.7\%$  di 2022. Di saat yang sama, Perseroan mencatatkan EBITDA sebesar USD342,9 juta, menurun dari USD472,4 juta di tahun 2022, seesingga margin EBITDA menurun menjadi  $37.0\%$  di tahun 2023 dibandingkandengan  $52.2\%$  di tahun 2022.

# Bagian atas Laba Entitas Asosiasi

Bagian laba atas Entitas Asosiasi menurun menjadi USD24,9 juta di tahun 2023 dari USD39,1 juta di tahun 2022. Pada tahun 2023, Perseroan mencatatkan perolehan bagian atas laba tersebut, di antaranya dari IMI sebesar USD18,5 juta dan NIC sebesar USD6,5 juta.

# Laba Sebelum Pajak Penghasilan

Berdasarkan faktor-faktor yang telah dijelaskan sebelumnya, Perseroan mencatatkan penurunan sebesar  $44.9\%$  laba sebelum pajak penghasilan di tahun 2023 menjadi USD263,0 juta dari tahun 2022 yang sebesar USD477,5 juta.

# Laba Tahun Berjalan

Pada tahun 2023, LABa tahun berjalan tercatat sebesar USD195,7 juta, menurun  $48.5\%$  dibandingkan tahun 2022 yang sebesar USD379,8 juta. Penurunan ini mencyebabkan laba bersih yang diatribusikan kepada pemilik Entitas Induk untuk tahun 2023 menurun sebesar  $49.9\%$  menjadi USD151,0 juta dari USD301,8 juta di tahun sebelumnya.

# Penghasilan Komprehensif Lain Tahun Berjalan Setelah Pajak

Penghasilan komprehensif lain tahun berjalan setelah pajak tercatat sebesar USD0,5 juta pada tahun 2023, menc Gat dibandingkan tahun 2022 yang mencatat kerugian sebesar USD0,5 juta.

# Total Penghasilan Komprehensif Tahun Berjalan

Pada tahun 2023, totalpenghasilan komprehensif tahun berjalan tercatat sebesar USD196,1 juta,menurundibandingkan tahun 2022 yang sebesar USD379,3 juta. Dari nilaitersebut,penghasilan komprehensif tahun berjalan yang dapatdiatribusikan kepada pemilik Entitas Induk sebesar USD151,5 juta,sedangkan sisanya sebesar USD44,6 juta diatribusikansepada kepentingan non-pengendali.

# Laba per Saham Dasar

Pada tahun 2023, luba per saham dasar yang dapat diatribusikan kepada pemilik Entitas Induk sebesar USD0,01134, mengalami penurunan dari tahun sebelumnya yang mencapai USD0,02276.

# Operating Profit

The Company recorded an operating profit of USD286.9 million in 2023, a decrease from USD440.2 million in 2022. This affected the operating profit margin to  $31.0\%$  in 2023, down from  $48.7\%$  in 2022. At the same time, the Company recorded EBITDA of USD342.9 million, a decrease from USD472.4 million in 2022, which decreased the EBITDA margin to  $37.0\%$  in 2023 compared to  $52.2\%$  in 2022.

# Share of Profit of Associated Entities

Share of profit of Associates decreased to USD24.9 million in 2023 from USD39.1 million in 2022. In 2023, the Company recorded a share of these profits, including from IMI of USD18.5 million and from NIC of USD6.5 million.

# Profit Before Income Tax

Based on the aforementioned factors, the Company recorded a  $44.9\%$  decrease in profit before income tax in 2023 to USD263.0 million from USD477.5 million in 2022.

# Profit for the Year

In 2023, the profit for the year was recorded at USD195.7 million, a decrease of  $48.5\%$  compared USD379.8 million in 2022. This decrease caused net profit attributable to the owners of the Parent for 2023 to decrease by  $49.9\%$  to USD151.0 million from USD301.8 million in the previous year.

# Other Comprehensive Income for the Year, Net of Tax

Other comprehensive income for the year, net of tax was recorded at USD0.5 million in 2023, increased compared to 2022 which recorded a loss of USD0.5 million.

# Total Comprehensive Income for the Year

In 2023, the total comprehensive income for the year was recorded at USD196.1 million, decreased compared to USD379.3 million in 2022. Of this amount, the comprehensive income for the year attributable to owners of the Parent was USD151.5 million, while the remaining USD44.6 million was attributable to non-controlling interests.

# Basic Earnings per Share

In 2023, basic earnings per share attributable to owners of the Parent were USD0.01134, a decrease from that of the previous year USD0.02276.

# Total Aset

Total aset pada tahun 2023 tercatat sebesar USD1.633,1 juta, menc Gat  $27,7\%$  dari USD1.278,8 juta pada tahun 2022. Peningkatan total aset ini berasal dari peningkatan total aset tidak lancar sebesar  $58,1\%$  dibandingkan tahun sebelumnya.

# Total Aset Lancar

Padatabun 2023, total asset lancartercatatsebesar USD432,3juta,iturun  $16.8\%$  dibandingkan tahun 2022 sebesar USD519,3juta. Hal ini terutama sebagian berasal dari penurunan kas dan setara kas sebesar USD213,4 juta untuk menurun  $57.6\%$  dibandingkan tahun 2022 dan di offset dengan pengkitan persediaan sebesar USD34,6 juta untuk kenaikan  $80.0\%$  dari tahun sebelumnya, pengkitan piutang usaha kepada pihak ketiga sebesar USD42,6juta untuk naik  $65.6\%$  dibandingkan tahun sebelumnya, serta kenaikan atas pajak dibayar di muka sebesar USD45,6 juta dibandingkan tahun 2022.

# Total Assets

Total assets in 2023 were recorded at USD1,633.1 million, an increase of  $27.7\%$  from USD1,278.8 million in 2022. This increase in total assets came from an increase in total non-current assets of  $58.1\%$  compared to that of the previous year.

# Total Current Assets

In 2023, the total current assets were recorded at USD432.3 million, a decrease of  $16.8\%$  compared to USD519.3 million in 2022. This mainly came from a decrease in cash and cash equivalents of USD213.4 million or decreasing by  $57.6\%$  compared to 2022, and was offset by an increase in inventories of USD34.6 million or an increase of  $80.0\%$  from that of the previous year, an increase in trade receivables from third parties of USD42.6 million or an increase of  $65.6\%$  compared to the previous year, and an increase in prepaid taxes of USD45.6 million compared to that of 2022.

# Total Aset Tidak Lancar

Total asset tidak lancar per 31 Desember 2023 mengalami peningkatan sebesar  $58.1\%$  menjadi USD1.200,8 juta dari USD759,5 juta per 31 Desember 2022. Peningkatan total aset tidak lancar di antaranya berasal dari peningkatan bersih aset tetap sebesar USD117,4 juta dan piutang lain-lain sebesar USD493,5 juta. Penambahan bersih aset tetap tersebut terutama karena kombinasi bisnis dari perolehan kepemilikan saham di IMI. Sedangkan kenaikan piutang lain-lain terutama digunakan Perseroan untuk pembiayaan di PT Blue Sparking Energy, yang masih dalam的前提下 pembangunan proyek high pressure acid leaching (HPAL) yang berlokasi di Indonesia Weda Bay Industrial Park.

# Total Liabilities

Total reliabilitas Perseroan tercatat sebesar USD458,4 juta pada tahun 2023, mencapat  $60.0\%$  dari USD286,5 juta di akhir tahun 2022. Nilai tersebut terdiri dari reliabilitas jangka pendek sebesar USD256,9 juta dan reliabilitas jangka panjang sebesar USD201,5 juta di tahun 2023.

# Total Liabilities Jangka Pendek

Pada tahun 2023, total reliitas jangka pendek tercatat sebesar USD256,9 juta, mencapat  $13.8\%$  dibandingkan tahun 2022 sebesar USD225,7 juta. Peningkatan tersebut terutama karena adanya utang wesel sebesar USD70,4 juta serta peningkatan utang kepada pihak ketiga sebesar USD58,2 juta dibandingkan tahun 2022 serta di offset dengan penurunan utang pjak sebesar USD62,4juta, penurunan utang dividen sebesar USD24,1 juta dan penurunan biaya yang masih harus dibayar sebesar USD22,9 juta.

# Total Liabilities Jangka Panjang

Total reliabilitas jangka panjang pada tahun 2023 tercatat sebesar USD201,5 juta, menc Gat dibandingkan tahun 2022 sebesar USD60,8 juta. Peningkatan tersebut sebagian untuk disebabkan oleh pengkatan utang bank jangka panjang sebesar USD136,6 juta dibandingkan tahun 2022.

# Total Ekuitas

Total ekuitas pada tahun 2023 tercatat sebesar USD1.174,7 juta, menc Gat  $18,4\%$  dibandingkan tahun 2022 sebesar USD992,3 juta. Peningkatan tersebut terdiri dari peningkatan ekuitas yang diatribusikan kepada pemilik Entitas Induk menjadi sebesar USD885,8 juta dan kepentingan non-pengendali sebesar USD288,9 juta pada tahun 2023.

# Total Non-Current Assets

The total non-current assets as of December 31, 2023 increased by  $58.1\%$  to USD1,200.8 million from USD759.5 million as of December 31, 2022. The increase in total non-current assets came from a net increase in fixed assets of USD117.4 million and other receivables of USD493.5 million. The net addition to fixed assets was mainly due to business combination of acquiring share ownership in IMI. Meanwhile, the increase in other receivables was mainly used by the Company in financing at PT Blue Sparking Energy, which was still in the construction phase of the high pressure acid leaching (HPAL) project, located in Indonesia Weda Bay Industrial Park.

# Total Liabilities

The Company's total liabilities were recorded at USD458.4 million in 2023, an increase of  $60.0\%$  from USD286.5 million at the end of 2022. This amount consisted of current liabilities of USD256.9 million and non-current liabilities of USD201.5 million in 2023.

# Total Current Liabilities

In 2023, total current liabilities were recorded at USD256.9 million, an increase of  $13.8\%$  compared to USD225.7 million in 2022. This increase was mainly due to notes payable of USD70.4 million and an increase in payables to third parties of USD58.2 million compared to 2022 and offset by a decrease in taxes payables of USD62.4 million, a decrease in dividend payable of USD24.1 million, and a decrease in accrued expenses of USD22.9 million.

# Total Non-Current Liabilities

Total non-current liabilities in 2023 were recorded at USD201.5 million, an increase compared to USD60.8 million in 2022. This increase was mostly due to an increase in long-term bank loans of USD136.6 million compared to that of 2022.

# Total Equity

Total equity in 2023 was recorded at USD1,174.7 million, an increase of  $18.4\%$  compared to USD992.3 million in 2022. This increase consisted of an increase in equity attributable to the owners of the Parent to USD885.8 million and non-controlling interests of USD288.9 million in 2023.

Pada tahun 2023, masing-masing rasio tersebut tecatat sebesar  $0,3x$  dan  $0,4x$ , menurun dari tahun 2022 yang tercatat sebesar  $0,2x$  dan  $0,4x$ . # Liquidity Ratio

The Company's liquidity ratio is measured by its current ratio. In 2023, the current ratio was recorded at  $1.7x$ , a decrease compared to  $2.3x$  in 2022. However, this ratio shows that the Company has sufficient current assets to pay off current liabilities in 2023.

# Solvency Ratio

The Company's solvency ratio is measured by its total liabilities to total assets ratio and the ratio of total liabilities to total equity. From such amount, it can be concluded that the Company has sufficient capital and assets to pay all its liabilities.

# Informasi dan Fakta Material setelah Tanggal Laporan Keuangan

Informasi dan fakta material setelah tanggal pelaporan diuraikan sebagai berikut:

# 1. Investasi pada Instrumen Ekuitas PT Sunny Metal Industry

Pada tanggal 24 Januari 2024, Entitas Anak dari Grup, THN, seksukan pembelian saham PT Sunny Metal Industry yang dimiliki oleh Berg Holding Ltd. PT Sunny Metal Industry adalah suatu Perseroan Terbatas yang didirikan berdasarkan hukum yang berlaku di Indonesia dan bergerak dalam bidang pengolahan dan pemurnian nikel. Dalam transaksi jual beli saham tersebut, THN memperoleh 10.550 saham, yang mewakili  $10,55\%$  kepemilikan saham di PT Sunny Metal Industry, dengan total harianya pembelian sebesar USD10.550.000.

# 2. Akuisisi WMI

Pada tanggal 26 Januari 2024, Entitas Anak dari Grup, HNI, memperoleh kendlai atas WMI (Entitas Asosiasi) dengan membeli tambahan saham WMI yang dimiliki oleh Prime Investment Capital Ltd dan Walsin Singapore Pte Ltd. WMI adalah suatu Perseroan Terbatas yang didirikan berdasarkan hukum yang berlaku di Indonesia dan bergerak dalam bidang pengolahan dan pemurnian nikel. Dalam transaksi jual beli saham tersebut, HNI memperoleh 1.214.000 saham, yang mewakili  $60.7\%$  kepemilikan saham di WMI, dengan total hari pengemblian sebesar USD215.219.540, seesingga kepemilikan saham HNI dalam WMI mencapat dari sebelumnya sebesar  $20.0\%$  menjadi sebesar  $80.7\%$ .

# Material Facts and Information Subsequent to the Accountant's Reporting Date

Information and material facts subsequent to the reporting date are described as follows:

# 1. Investment in Equity Instrument of PT Sunny Metal Industry

On January 24, 2024, a Subsidiary of the Group, THN, acquired PT Sunny Metal Industry's shares owned by Berg Holding Ltd. PT Sunny Metal Industry is a Limited Liability Company established under the laws applicable in Indonesia and is engaged in the processing and refining of nickel ore. In the share purchase transaction, THN acquired 10,550 shares, representing  $10.55\%$  of share ownership in PT Sunny Metal Industry, with a total purchase price of USD10,550,000.

# 2. Acquisition of WMI

On January 26, 2024, a Subsidiary of the Group, HNI, gained control of WMI (Associated Entities) by purchasing additional WMI's shares owned by Prime Investment Capital Ltd and Walsin Singapore Pte Ltd. WMI is a Limited Liability Company established under the laws applicable in Indonesia and is engaged in the processing and refining of nickel ore. In the share purchase transaction, HNI acquired 1,214,000 shares, representing  $60.7\%$  of share ownership in WMI, with a total purchase price of USD215,219,540, hence the HNI's ownership in WMI increased from previously  $20.0\%$  to  $80.7\%$ .

# Prospek Usaha

Memasuki tahun 2024, pertumbuhan ekonomi global diprakirakan meleah menjadi  $2,8\%$  dan disertai divergensi pertumbuhan antarnegara yang makin melebar. Risiko koreksi pertumbuhan ekonomi dunia juga dapat terjadi apabila tingginya fragmentasi geopolitik dan geoekonomi terus berlanjut, termasuk dampaknya terhadap kembali naiknya做大 energi dan pangan, serta lebih lamanya pengetatan kebujanan moneter khususnya di negara maju untuk mampu menurunkan inflasi kembali ke sasarannya di masingmasing negara. Sementara itu, Bank Indonesia menganalisis pertumbuhan ekonomi Indonesia tahun 2024 berada pada rentang  $4,7\% -5,5\%$  dan inflasi diprakirakan tetap terkendali pada kisaran sasan  $2,5\pm 1\%$ . Indikator-indikator penting yang mendorong pertumbuhan ekonomi Indonesia tersebut meliputi permintaan domestik yang sejalan dengan kenaikan gaji ASN, penyelenggaraan Pemilu, dan pembangunan IKN.

Adapun peluang-peluang di industri batu bara, Perseroan melihat potensi相对较 yang masih terbuka luas sieiring dengan besarnya target kebutuhan batu bara yang ditetapkan pemerintah. Di tahun 2024, Kementerian ESDM akan memprioritaskan kebutuhan batu bara untuk pemenuhan kepentingan dalam negeri dengan target DMO sebesar 181,3 juta tan dari total produksi 710 juta ton. Tren peningkatan kebutuhan batu bara ini disebabkan adanya permintaan listrik dan tambahan projek-proyek PLTU Barang dari program 35.000 MW.

Untuk prospek industri nikel, Bank Dunia memproyeksikan惠及 nikel global akan turun kembali pada tahun 2024, melanjutkan tren pelemahan yang terjadi di sepanjang tahun 2023. Adapun Bank Dunia memuat projeyksi tersebut berdasarkan adanya mengkatan pasokan nikel dari negara-negara produsen utama,seperti China, Indonesia,dan Filipina.Sementara di tengah kenaikan pasokan, permintaan nikel diprediksi akan berkurang sieiring dengan munculnya tekologi baterai kendaruan listrik berbasis lithium iron phosphate (LFP) sebagai pengganti nikel. Meski demikian, Bank Dunia berekspektasi惠及 nikel bisa sedikit untuk menguat menjadi USD20.500 per ton pada tahun 2025,apabila ada mengkatan permintaan baterai mobil listrik.

# Business Outlook

Entering 2024, global economic growth is forecasted to weaken to  $2.8\%$  with widening divergence in growth among countries. The risk of a correction in global economic growth could occur if the high fragmentation in geopolitics and geoeconomics persists, including its impact on the resurgence of energy and food prices, as well as prolonged monetary policy tightening, especially in developed countries to bring inflation back to their respective targets. Meanwhile, Bank Indonesia analyzes Indonesia's economic growth in 2024 to be in the range of  $4.7\% -5.5\%$ , and inflation is expected to remain under control within the target range of  $2.5\pm 1\%$ . Key indicators driving Indonesia's economic growth include domestic demand aligned with the increase in civil servant salaries, the general elections, and the development of Nusantara Capital City (IKN).

As for opportunities in coal industry, the Company sees vast market potential due to the government's ambitious coal demand targets. In 2024, the Ministry of Energy and Mineral Resources will prioritize coal needs to fulfill domestic interests with a Domestic Market Obligation (DMO) target of 181.3 million tons from a total production of 710 million tons. The increasing trend in coal demand is driven by electricity demand and additional new coal-fired power plant projects from the 35,000 MW program.

For nickel industry outlook, the World Bank projects that global nickel prices will decline again in 2024, continuing the weakening trend observed throughout 2023. The World Bank makes this projection based on the increase in nickel supply from major producing countries such as China, Indonesia, and the Philippines. While supply is increasing, nickel demand is predicted to decrease with the emergence of lithium iron phosphate (LFP) battery technology for electric vehicles as a substitute for nickel. However, the World Bank expects nickel prices to slightly strengthen to USD20,500 per ton in 2025 if there is an increase in demand for electric vehicle batteries.

Melihat prospek industri batu bara dan nikel sebagai bagian dari industri mineral danbserv Baru, pemerintah terus berupaya melakukan perbaikan dan transformasi kegiatan bisnis pertambangan mineral danbserv baru yang dilaksanan melalui tata kelola pertambangan nasional. Implementasi tata kelola pertambangan nasional tersebut diharapkan mampu mempercepat pengekatan nilai tambah mineral di Indonesia yang nantinya dapat mencukatkan ketahanan energi nasional.

Looking at the prospects of coal and nickel industries as part of mineral and coal industry, the government continues to strive for improvement and transformation of mineral and coal mining activities through national mining governance. The implementation of this national mining governance is expected to accelerate the increase in mineral value-added in Indonesia, which will ultimately enhance national energy resilience.

# Kebijakan Dividen

Kebijakan pembagian dividend Perseroan didasarkan pada Anggaran Dasar dan diputusan melalui RUPS. Dividen yang akan dibayarkan setidaknya  $35\%$  dari laba bersih dengan mempertimbangkan tersebut faktor. Faktor yangjadikan pertimbangan untuk pembayaran dividemeliputi:

1. Kewajaran atas pembayaran dividend;  
2. Memperhatikan kepentingan Perseroan;  
3. Laba ditahan dapat usaha dan keuangan yang positif;  
4. Kondisi likuiditas Perseroan;  
5. Prospek usaha diASA depan (termasuk belanja modal dan akuisisi);  
6. Kebutuhan kas;  
7. Peluang bisnis; dan  
8. Faktor lain yang dianggap relevant.

# Dividend Policy

The dividend distribution policy is decided based on the policies in the Company's Articles of Association and through the General Meeting of Shareholders (GMS). The dividend amount to be paid is at least  $35\%$  of net profit with due consideration of a few factors. Several considerations in paying dividends are:

1. Fairness of the dividend payment;  
2. With due observance of the Company's interest;  
3. Retained earnings and positive financial position;  
4. The Company's liquidity condition;  
5. Future business prospect (including capital expenditure and acquisition);  
6. Cash requirement;  
7. Business opportunities; and  
8. Other factors considered relevant.

# Perjanjian Signifikan

1. Pada tanggal 27 September 2023, HNI dan WMI (pihak berelasi) telah menandatangani Perjanjian Pinjaman sehubungan dengan pemberian fasilitas pinjaman sejumlah sebanyak-banyaknya USD90.000.000 atas nilai setaranya dalam Rupiah untuk tujuan pembiayaan belanja modal, modal kerja dan pembiayaan umum perusahaan serta untuk tujuan investasi. Pinjaman tersebut akan dikenakan bunga atas julumahPokok sebesar SOFR  $+2,60\%$  per tahun terhitung-Sejak tanggal dicairkanya setup pinjaman sampai dengan julumahPokok erkait dilunasi seluruhnya. Tanggal maturitas pinjaman adalah 42 bulan-Sejak tanggal berlakunya perjanjian, yaitu 27 Desember 2026. Sampai dengan tanggal 31 Desember 2023,fasilitas ini telah diutilisasi oleh WMI sebesar USD93.450.000; dan  
2. Perseroan tersebut Perjanjian Utang Piutang dengan TBH (pihak berelasi) pada tanggal 23 Maret 2020. Perseroan dan TBH telah menandatangani Perjanjian Utang Piutang pada 7 Februari 2011 yang terakhir diubah dengan Addendum-2 Perjanjian Utang Piutang tanggal 2 Januari 2017. Dalam Addendum-3, TBH sebagai pihak kedua dan Perseroan sebagai pihak pertama memiliki kesepakatan untuk pinjaman yang bersifat berulang dengan jumlah settinggi-tingginya sebesar Rp50.000.000.000,- dengan sukubunga  $5\%$  per tahun dan USD5.000.000 dengan sukubunga  $2\%$  per tahun. Bunga atas utang dalam Rupiah maupun USD akan jatuh tempo setiap akhir tahun dan dapat ditinja kembali setiap waktu oleh pihak pertama. Jangka waktu pemberian utang menjadi 5 tahun terhitung-Sejak tanggal yang tercantum dalam Addendum-3 dan demikian menjadi berakhir tanggal 22 Maret 2025.

# Transaksi dengan Pihak-pihak Berelasi dan Kewajaran Transaksi

Pada tahun 2023,iburuh transaksi dengan pihak berelasi dilakukan secara wajar (arm's length) dan sesuai dengan peraturan perdang-undangan. Transaksi dilakukan atas dasaralan kebutuhan Perseroan dan bebas dari konflik kepentingan.

2. POJK No. 42/POJK/04/2020 tanggal 1 Juli 2020 tantal Transaksi Afiliasi dan Transaksi Benturan Kepentingan.

# Pernyataan Dewan Komisaris, Direksi, dan Komite Audit

# Significant Agreements

1. On September 27, 2023, HNI and WMI (related party) have entered into a Loan Facility Agreement in relation to the provision of a loan facility of up to USD90,000,000 or its equivalent amount in Rupiah for the purposes of financing WMI's capital expenditure, working capital, and general corporate and investment purposes. The loan outstanding shall accrue interest on the principal balance at SOFR +2.60% per annum calculated from the date of the disbursement of any loan until the respective principal amount is fully repaid. The maturity date of the loan is 42 months from the effective date of the agreement, which is December 27, 2026. Up to December 31, 2023, this facility has been utilized by WMI of USD93,450,000; and  
2. The Company entered into a Debt Agreement with TBH (related party) on March 23, 2020. The Company and TBH had signed a Debt Agreement on February 7, 2011, which was last amended by Addendum-2 of the Debt Agreement dated January 2, 2017. In Addendum-3, TBH as the second party and the Company as the first party agreed to a revolving loan with a maximum amount of Rp50,000,000,000 at an interest rate of  $5\%$  per annum and USD5,000,000 at an interest rate of  $2\%$  per year. The interest on the debt in both Rupiah and USD will be due at the end of each year and can be reviewed at any time by the first party. The term of the debt is five years starting from the date stated in Addendum-3 and thus ends on March 22, 2025.
